pkgmetadata.longdescription: PyCuber=======PyCuber is a Rubik's Cube package in Python 2/3.--------------------------------------------------The cube can be revealed as expanded view in the terminal, so it's easyto visualise the cube, just inside the terminal. (Not tested on Windows).. code-block:: python >>> import pycuber as pc >>> # Create a Cube object >>> mycube = pc.Cube() >>> # Do something at the cube. >>> mycube("R U R' U'") >>> print(mycube).. image:: http://i.imgur.com/OI4kbn7.pngWe also provided some useful tools to deal with Rubik's Cube formulae... code-block:: python >>> import pycuber as pc >>> # Create a Formula object >>> my_formula = pc.Formula("R U R' U' R' F R2 U' R' U' R U R' F'") >>> # Reversing a Formula >>> my_formula.reverse() >>> print(my_formula) >>> # Mirroring a Formula >>> myalg.mirror("LR") >>> print(my_formula) F R U' R' U R U R2 F' R U R U' R' F' L' U L U' L' U' L2 F L' U' L' U LI'll add some documentations later.
